result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stephenie L. VICE

defendant.name: VICE, Stephenie L.
defendant.address: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.
State moves to dismiss and read in all counts.  The defendant plead to charges in 16 CF 336, 16 CF 181 and 15 CF 546.  Motion granted.
The $100.00 cash bail is transferred and applied to court costs on 16 CF 336.
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Stephenie L. VICE
Current: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 05-20-2016)
Prior: 2336 Roosevelt Avenue, Two Rivers, WI 54241 United States
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The matter is continued for Plea Date on 06-30-2016 at 3:00 p.m., Br. 1.  Bail is set at an additional $250.00 cash, total bond $1,000.00 cash, with the continuing conditions that she have no contact with Walmart at 4115 Calumet Avenue, Manitowoc, or any part of it's premises, and have no contact with Jennifer Diaz.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the county jail.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail Issued.  Copy filed.
Warrant returned with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.

Notice of Bail/Bond Forfeiture.
Copies to DA, Attorney Hoff, defendant and Dean Miller.

Defendant failed to appear for a plea date.  She is a walk away from the Manitowoc County Jail at this time.
State requests warrant and forfeiture of bail.
Court authorizes warrant and forfeiture of bail.
Minutes.
Plea date on April 21, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives her right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.   Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
ARRAIGNMENT
Information filed.  Not guilty plea(s).  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 02-11-16 at 8:30 a.m.  State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Stephenie L. VICE
Current: 2336 Roosevelt Avenue, Two Rivers, WI 54241 United States  (Effective: 01-16-2016)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States

$100.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.   
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 01-20-16 at 2:00 p.m.   
Minutes.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of felony theft, retail theft and possess paraphernalia.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 01-11-16 at 2:30 p.m. Bail is set at $100.00 cash with the conditions that she have no contact with Walmart at 4115 Calumet Avenue, Manitowoc, WI or any part of it's premises, no contact with Jennifer Diaz and maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
